DOC.brief_summary: Objective: To determine if the treatment of subclinical hyperthyroidism will reduce the rate of atrial fibrillation, the main complication of this condition.
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized open-labelled multicentre study comparing radioiodine vs medical supervision without treatment
DOC.criteria: Men and women aged 50 and greater Isolated decreased thyroidstimulating hormone (TSH) with normal FT4 and FT3 levels Iodide overload Non sinusal heart rhythm Severe heart disease
